mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.boardId, r.nickname, r.reply, r.inserted, r.updated, u.nickname, u.id uid FROM tb_reply_life r JOIN tb_user u ON r.nickname = u.nickname WHERE r.boardId = #{id} AND u.withdrawal = 'X' ORDER BY r.id;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_reply_life (boardId, nickname, reply) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{nickname}, #{reply})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_reply_life SET boardId = #{boardId}, reply = #{reply}, updated = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(id) FROM tb_reply_life WHERE boardId=#{id}
